title: Final Fantasy skins
body:
I think riot should reach out to square enix and make a bunch of final fantasy skins for in game. I'm sure there's already a thread for this somewhere. 

Favorites: 
wakka draven skin
Sepheroth yasuo skin
Rikku evelynn skin
Tidus ekko skin

Gunblade already resembles Graves to me, and same with Riven and cloud.

Sorry for spelling and grammar mistakes I was typing fast on my phone got real excited about the Wakka draven idea.

replies.body: Lightning fiora would be awesome too kinda also already look alike... I'm starting to see a pattern here....

Riven as Cloud Strife
Jayce as Barret Wallace
Shyvana as Tifa Lockhart
Janna as Aerith Gainsborough
Warwick as Red XIII
Sivir as Yuffie Kisaragi
Nunu as Cait Sith
Udyr as Vincent Valentine
Xin Zhao as Cid Highwind
Yasuo as Sephiroth
Now I mean I think we need Teemog to show our moogle pals some love{{champion:17}}
Ultimecia Syndra....Celes Fiora....Gau Gnar....Irvine TF....Cyan Yasuo.....Rosa Ashe....Kain Jarvan....Eiko Lulu...etc etc

I'm clearly playing/am huge fan of FFX.  But I thought of battle goddess lightning kayle also. 

Saz-Lucian too much lol
